welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Martin de la Vega
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Martin de la Vega, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the vibrant culture and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal dedicated to military personnel and their families, providing access to base facilities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit or data cap.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Barajas Airport, currently undergoing renovations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, connected to Terminal 4S for long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 30-minute time limit per session.
